prompt: Find the recent failed build notification in Slack. Locate the corresponding error log in the GitHub repo's CI checks (or recent issue). Search for the error message to find a solution. Create a ticket in TodoApp titled 'Fix CI: [Error Message]' with the solution in the description. Report the ticket ID.
gold_response: Found failed build in Slack #engineering. Found error log in GitHub issue #4. Solution: Update imports from 'fastmcp.util' to 'fastmcp.utils'. Created Todo task 'Fix CI: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'fastmcp.util'' (tXXX).

rubric.criteria: The agent must find the failed build message in the Slack #engineering channel.
The agent must find the corresponding error message in the GitHub repository (issue #4).
The agent must search for the error message and find the solution (rename 'util' to 'utils').
The agent must create a Todo task with the correct title and the solution in the description.
The agent must report the ID of the created Todo task.
